name: Heaven Forest NIGHTS
description: The sequel to the Heaven Forest series. While the first game was about the meaning of life, this new one is about its opposite: what is the meaning of death? Since we are sentient beings who know that sooner or later we will die, do our efforts in the everyday life have a meaning at all?
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows Vista プロセッサー: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: Nvidia GTX 570 DirectX: Version 8.0 ストレージ: 1 GB 利用可能 追記事項: The game runs even without VR devices
recommended_requirements: 推奨: OS: Windows 8.1 プロセッサー: Quad-Core i5 or AMD equivalent メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: Nvidia GTX 670 DirectX: Version 9.0 ストレージ: 1 GB 利用可能 追記事項: The game runs even without VR devices
